ru.yandex.subtitles.ui.appwidget

Class AbstractAppWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • android.appwidget.AppWidgetProvider
        • ru.yandex.subtitles.ui.appwidget.AbstractAppWidget
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ListViewWidget, QuickStartWidget

    public abstract class AbstractAppWidget
extends android.appwidget.AppWidgetProvider
    Base class that handles common Android app widget events.
